title: Shinwa Densetsu no Eiyuu no Isekaitan (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Amnesia   Aristocracy   Army   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Elves   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Former Hero   Generals   Genius Protagonist   Kingdoms   Legends   Male Protagonist   Military   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Transported to Another World   Unique Weapons   Wars
author: Tatematsuri   奉
description:
Once upon a time, a boy was referred to as a “War Hero.”

In another world called Aletia, the boy who had saved the Lost Kingdom, conquered their neighbouring countries, and led to the rise of a grand empire decided to throw everything away, returning to the modern era at the cost of his memories.

As three years passed, the boy who was happily enjoying his daily life was once again called back to the other world.

However, what awaited him was the Aletia of 1000 years in the future.

As his past glories became a “myth,” the legend of the youth referred to as the, “Twin Black Hero King,” begins.

This WN was Discontinued for LN>
